title: Bachelor of Science in Mathematics
description: A Mathematics degree at Kennesaw State University can provide you with the training you need to develop problem-solving skills, critical and quantitative thinking, and logical argument. The coursework also provides a solid foundation for analytical, geometrical, and numerical methods for real-world problems. These highly valued skills can be applied in numerous career fields, including technology, engineering, education, and other industries.
careers: Statistician, Secondary School Mathematics Teacher, College Math Professor, Actuary, Market Research Analyst.
